article.title: SAIC Receives Army Biometrics Task Force Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a contract by the Army's Biometrics Task Force (BTF) to provide biometrics support services in support of the Biometrics Operations and Support Services Unrestricted (BOSS-U) program. The contract has a total ceiling value of $497 million.
